Uses of IMBanner in com.inmobi.monetization
 

Methods in com.inmobi.monetization with parameters of type IMBanner
 void IMBannerListener.onBannerInteraction(IMBanner banner, Map<String,String> params)
          Called when the banner is tapped or interacted with by the user.
Optional data is available to publishers to act on when using monetization platform to render promotional ads
 void IMBannerListener.onBannerRequestFailed(IMBanner banner, IMErrorCode errorCode)
          Called from IMBanner when this view has failed to load an ad.
 void IMBannerListener.onBannerRequestSucceeded(IMBanner banner)
          Called from IMBanner when this view successfully loaded an ad.
 void IMBannerListener.onDismissBannerScreen(IMBanner banner)
          Called from IMBanner when the ad comes back to its original position because of actions such as the user closing the expanded ad.
 void IMBannerListener.onLeaveApplication(IMBanner banner)
          Called from IMBanner when the click on the ad leaves the application context.
 void IMBannerListener.onShowBannerScreen(IMBanner banner)
          Called from IMBanner when the ad expands on top of the screen because of an user action.
